commentBody: When you watch the NFL's network series "A Football Life" about very successful coaches like Bill Parcells, the one thing that stands out is that  almost all of them have or develop quirks in personality coupled with the pressure of continued demands in the NFL that, eventually undercut, at some point, their ability to be  successful..  Bill Belichick's  winning record is at Hall of Fame level,  but his no nonsense attitude and work ethic is just exemplary, and is a standard for many of us in the general population who are not coaches.
